title: Addition and opposite
content: We define the operations of addition and opposite on the extended complex numbers and on the complex projective line (Riemann sphere) simultaneously, thus "overloading" the operations.

blocks.name: caddcc
blocks.content: Syntax for the addition on extended complex numbers.

blocks.name: df-bj-addc
blocks.content: Define the additions on the extended complex numbers (on the subset of ` ( CCbar X. CCbar ) ` where it makes sense) and on the complex projective line (Riemann sphere). We use the plural in "additions" since these are two different operations, even though ` +cc ` is overloaded. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: coppcc
blocks.content: Syntax for negation on the set of extended complex numbers and the complex projective line (Riemann sphere).

blocks.name: df-bj-oppc
blocks.content: Define the negation (operation giving the opposite) on the set of extended complex numbers and the complex projective line (Riemann sphere). For infinite extended complex numbers, the argument of ` inftyexpitau ` is the opposite of the argument temporary real. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
